conversation.content: Should AI systems be allowed to make autonomous healthcare decisions?
Yes, AI systems should be allowed to make autonomous healthcare decisions in well-defined scenarios.
What about the risks of bias and errors?
Those risks exist, but they can be managed. I still support AI making autonomous decisions, provided there are safety checks and human oversight for edge cases.
